explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a mint green shirt and black trousers is lying face down on the concrete ground. A woman wearing a headscarf and an orange and white dress is sitting on the ground with her back to him. There are several white pillars in the background, the walls are white, and there is a brown window.

There is a blue door behind her, a metal water pump in the corner, and a small brown bed on the right. The woman picks up the metal water bottle to drink, the man seizes the opportunity to quickly get up, grabs the flatbread, dips it in the bowl, takes a bite, and then crawls to the right.
